title: Jonny Lieberman (Motor Trend)
description:
Jonny Lieberman is a long-time automotive journalist for Motor Trend. He's driven all the greatest cars, had the best whiskey, and usually has a funny way of explaining his opinions. It's always a good show when Jonny sits down. We talk about the RUF Yellowbird, M2 CS vs Cayman GT4, which Bugatti Chiron is the one to buy, and more.

 

Policygenius saved customers up to $1,055 per year compared to their current home & auto policies. Head to Policygenius.com now to get started.

 

Let Sunday take the guesswork out of growing a greener, more beautiful lawn this Spring. Visit getsunday.com/tire to get $20 off your custom lawn plan at checkout!

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (jonny lieberman)
